Must balance pricing strategy with review generation

tactics.pricing: Launch at 30% below market rate, 'Grand Opening Special', Free night for first 3 guests who review, Money-back guarantee

tactics.pricingEvolution: Increase rates by 15% (still competitive), Maintain special offers for off-peak, Length-of-stay discounts, Last-minute deals

tactics.pricingFinalization: Match or exceed market rate, Implement dynamic pricing tool, Premium for high-demand dates, Loyalty discounts for repeats

keyLearnings: Competitive pricing beats marketing in month 1
Response speed directly correlates to bookings
Social proof compounds (reviews ‚Üí more bookings ‚Üí more reviews)
